name: deimosrising
text: If you have a best friend, and you have been too drunk around him, you love this strip.

name: mrectomy
text: I have actually been in this exact same situation. As fate would have it, I puked facing my friend's house, hanging out the passenger side window. The S-curve street was just too much.

name: catachresis
text: There is a certain power to "dick" in italics

name: evilbobikus
text: As bad as his hangover is, an italicized "dick" is a hella harsh thing to say to someone that committed suicide just to go to hell and help you out.

name: i_love_kate
text: You got that right, dick.

name: miku224
text:
This strip always reminds me of this one:

http://overcompensating.com/posts/20041203.html

Sorry for the lack of any BBCode.

name: spanntastic
text: Dave in Arkansas. You know what Im talkin about...

name: shmuckeles
text:
dick
i feel it

name: shmuckeles
text: (ahem)

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: A comment left by everything_is_a_hat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, straw, taiiga, ishuta, hellofyellin, riotdejaneiro, glowpaisley, Gompo, TwoRightFeet, goocifer, cmjhogan, dennycrane, apricotta, patiently56, LuckyG, mustconcentrate, aHatOfPig, Fcannon, Tragic_Johnson, Doc_Rostov, Audhumla, Quartzblade, Crimson_King, Nictusempra)

name: canusdivinus
text: Don't thank her, thank anarchy!

name: prine
text: aww yeah who brings the pain

name: centipede_damascus
text: That is some crazy stream of vomit there.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: agreed - it's more like a vomitfall.

name: dovey
text: The vomit seems to be melting the bitumen

name: erinye
text: Chubbied for "bitumen."

name: rasalghul
text: we would also have chubbied macadam .

name: tttt
text: if you run a red light in hell do you go to ultra hell

name: zedpower
text: You go to Incredible Hell!

name: dougthehead
text: The punishment for running a red light in Hell is... Incredible Hell.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: which is ruled by the Super Devil.

name: i_love_kate
text: Who is just so much more than a match for God.

name: woodenteeth
text: One in the same.

name: jaredwilde
text: Superhell actually. It totally sucks there

name: letterswewrote
text: one of the most accurate portrayals of the driven-home-unimaginably-hungover state yet.

name: timasi
text: That last panel is perfect because it is universal. I've had that exact same exchange, albeit in a bathroom instead of a car.

name: i_love_kate
text: Why would you have a red light in a bathroom.

name: tekende
text: So you know when it's safe to go, of course.

name: halofyre
text: Who hasn't been on both sides of this coin? I don't want to know them!

name: spinynorman
text:
When you are really drunk and grabbing porcelain for some reason it immediately activates the ANGRY LOBE in your brain.

*flashback to me watching my friend vomit into a trashcan in his lap, one free hand feebly holding up the finger, and him periodically shouting FUCK YOU, WHORES!*

name: quantumcasaba
text:
A particularly surly friend is hugging the porcelain at a local dive bar...
Random ambitious bathroom seeker: "OH, honey is she okay?"
"Yeah, it's her birthday. She just turned 21."
"Ohmigawd! Happy birthday, hon!"
Friend barely looks up and croaks "Fuck.. yoou.."

name: fuckyoufriday
text: That nosy bitch earned a legitimate "fuck you", in my opinion.

name: tekende
text: Interesting. Back when I used to drink heavily, I loved throwing up, because it meant that a) the pain would go away and b) I could drink some more!

name: foetus_punch
text: I was once looking after a dude when he was in a most vomitous state, and I discovered he had a sinister side, both in the most classical sense and in the sense of evil. When I stood on his left side, holding him up, he would punch me, alternatively yell and whisper swears into my ear, and try an escape me so he could go vomit in the neighbor's yard again. He would act like a little vomiting angel whilst I stood on his right, however. Also, I decided that to make him get all the vomit out we had to "James Bond this shit", and I made him drink a glass of one part salt, two parts water. He heck of vomited.

name: boredom_man
text: OK, just so the story makes sense: were you so drunk that you thought that was a good idea, would you normally think that's a good idea, or were you trying to kill him?

name: foetus_punch
text: I was a) fantastically hammered and b) I made sure he didn't drink it all.

name: taskmaster
text: you are one sick motherfucker!

name: conmansj
text: My friends never had the decency to wait for a red light before puking out the window. Ray's such a nice dude for not leaving racing stripes down the side of Beef's Brat.

name: echidnaboy
text: Ray can't even muster the strength for a capital S.

name: mattylite
text: The full spectrum of types of puking: up in the hotel Ray was just like urp . Now that he's in a car he goes to the more robust HURRRGH.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Hey RAY! You threw up! How come?

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
YES.

Please accept this chubby which I am offering to you.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: completely also deserving of a shut up.

name: anticitizen
text: this one's my favorite, just ordered the framed print.

name: tekende
text:
There is a reference to this in Volume 3 of Scott Pilgrim , I believe. It takes place in a bathroom, but Scott calls Stephen Stills a dick while he is throwing up, or something. I forget the exact line.

I wouldn't be so certain that it is referencing this strip except that in volume 1 there is an Achewood comic on a computer monitor in one panel.

name: theguitarhero
text: I'm gonna have to go back and read the series now, didn't even know that.

name: tekende
text: I reread the series quite often. Volume 5 was depressing but good, and now I can't wait for the final volume even though it'll probably be like two years or something.

name: rowan
text: This sums up every cab ride I have had home on a friday or satrday night ever
